import React, {useState} from 'react' import { TextField, MenuItem, Select} from '@mui/material'; import AccordionCom from './Accordion'; import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import Backdrop from '@mui/material/Backdrop'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Modal from '@mui/material/Modal'; import Fade from '@mui/material/Fade'; import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close'; function ViewMember() { const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: 400, bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '2px solid #000', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, }; const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false); const [modalData, setData] = useState(); const handleOpen = index => { setOpen(true); setData(data[index]); }; const handleClose = () => { setOpen(false); }; const data = [ { title: 'Replace Member "KitKat"!', Info: "On replacing a member, all the statistics and record would get transfer to the new member. Are you sure you want to replace KitKat?" }, { title: 'Delete Member "KitKat"!', Info: "We recommend you to replace this member with the new one because, on deleting all the statistics and records would get deleted and this will be an irreversible action. Are you sure you want to delete KitKat?" }, ]; const [isActive, setActive] = useState("false"); const handleToggle = () => { setActive(!isActive); }; return (
